spiro 0.0.0.9000

Plot data from spiroergometry files

Source: R/plot.R
spiro_plot.Rd

spiro_plot_*() returns a ggplot2 graph visualising data from a spiroergometric test.

spiro_plot_VO2(data, smooth = 15, title = FALSE)

spiro_plot_HR(data, title = FALSE)

Arguments

data

A data.frame of the class spiro_*, as it is generated by spiro.
smooth

Integer for calculation of a rolling average (in seconds) for gas exchange measures.
title

Logical, whether there should be an automatically generated title containing participant's name and type of test.

Details

This function provides a shortcut for visualising spiroergometric data from spiro with ggplot2. It generates a graph showing the (smoothed) interpolated data, as well as the underlying test protocol.

Examples

# Import and process example data
gxt_data <- spiro(file = spiro_example("zan_gxt"))

spiro_plot_VO2(gxt_data)

#> Warning: Removed 3 row(s) containing missing values (geom_path).
#> Warning: Removed 17 row(s) containing missing values (geom_path).
